Summary: Orange, and round, almost the size of a quarter headed north and then picked up speed and turned right around and headed south, became invisible 3 times and went really fast and was out of sight.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wayland
There were no other sightings in Wayland on or around January 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went to bring my dog out, walked into the front yard and looked up at the stars it was a very clear night there were stars everywhere I just looked around and looked towards my neighbors house and noticed this bright orange orb that was quite large almost the size of a quarter. It was heading my way which was north, going a little fast a few seconds later it went really fast and turned around and headed south, it went faster then, and became almost completely invisible 3 times I watched it as it kept going for a few minutes and then it disappeared. There was no noise at all either. When I first seen it I knew it was a U.F.O. And I was excited because I've always wanted to see one and I finally got to.
